Outline & Show Notes

Chef & Food Fight Updates

  • Join us in the Chef Community Slack

  • ChefConf
    • Workshops
  • Training
    • Online training from The Linux Academy and Udemy
    • Classes - London, San Francisco, Washington DC, Seattle, Chicago, Dublin, Raleigh, Boston, and online.
  • Upcoming Chef Events
    • March 1 - Testing at the Edges webinar
    • March 2-5 - Southern California Linux Expo
    • March 3 - DevOps Automation M4 Meetup
    • March 3 - DevOpsDays Los Angeles
    • March 6-8 - QCon London
    • March 7-8 - DevOpsDays Baltimore
    • March 8 - Hands on with Habitat - London
    • March 8 - Quantifying DevOps Outcomes - Managing Risk webinar
  • Blog Posts
    • Chef Community Engineering – 2016 – A Year in Review
    • Infrastructure as Binaries
    • Habitat World Tour: Gent, Berlin, Amsterdam
  • Social Media
    • Tweet us - @foodfighshow

A3 Thinking

  • What is A3?
  • Solving Problems with A3
    • Plan Do Study Act
    • 5 Whys
  • It's Not Always Easy: Resistance to A3
    • Researching Your Own Practice: The Discipline of Noticing
    • Managing to Learn: Using the A3 management process by John Shook

    • The infinite hows
    • The Food Fight Show: Complexity Theory and Cynefin
    • The Challenger Launch Decision: Risky Technology, Culture, and Deviance at NASA
    • Each necessary, but only jointly sufficient
  • A3ing Alone vs in a Team Setting
  • Do we need a problem?
    • Food Fight Show: Design Thinking
    • David Allen's GTD (Getting Things Done)
  • Real Life Examples
    • Shuhari
    • Kaizen
